column1: Figure 4. Admissions to and releases from state prison, 2004–2014
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Figure 4. Admissions to and releases from state prison, 2004–2014

Note: Counts based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. Excludes transfers, escapes, and those absent without leave (AWOL), and includes other conditional release violators, returns from appeal or bond, and other admissions. See Methodology. See appendix table 1 for counts.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2004–2014.
